name: Tomb Stars 2
description:
Tomb Stars - a game in which they play and earn real money

How to make money on the Internet? It's very simple, play the game Tomb Stars 2, collect coins from level to level and withdraw real money. Making money on the Internet playing the game is a pretty pleasant process that will give you the opportunity to have a good time and get rewarded!

Tomb Stars is an arcade game with vertical mazes.

You need to collect coins passing through mazes of dangers, tunnels and "evil" traps. To move to a new level, you need to collect three stars. If you want to earn more, you need to collect all the coins and get a significant bonus. There is no advertising in the game, only for a fee, and this is a significant reward. Have a good game!
